coin(C) :- make_coin(C,0.8).
coins_r(SC,SC,0).
coins_r(SC,S,CNT) :-
 CNT > 0,
 
CNT1 is CNT - 1,
    (coin(CNT), SC1 is SC + 1, coins_r(SC1, S, CNT1) ;
    coins_r(SC, S, CNT1).
total(S) :- coins_r(0,S,4).
query(total(_)).
